case.title: Curvaceous, dark-skinned, and no make-up ... - 30 (London) - 30
case.text:
... that's my ideal woman! :)
Nice curves, dark skinned (black/tanned/midex-race) and comfortable enough to go out with no make up and high heels.
Needless to say ... my ideal woman is by no means shopping-obsessed (OK, admittedly, it's hard to find one like that in London!).
Do you fit the bill? Me: italian, 30, living in NW London...
Ciao :)
